articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Song and Dance Ensemble of KPISF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Song and Dance Ensemble of KPISF
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed a performance given by the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK together with Ri Sol Ju.
					 The performance began with overture "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic". Put on the stage were colorful numbers including male solo and chorus "Oh, My Motherland of Songun", male guitar quartet "We Will Live Like in Those Days" and dance "The Post I Am Defending."
					
					 The performers highly praised the immortal exploits the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by building a socialist power centred on the popular masses, the first of its kind in the history of the nation spanning five thousand years, and providing solid foundations for the eternal prosperity of the country.
					
					 They also sang the praises of the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK and represented the pledge of all the service personnel and people to creditably defend the country.
					
					 At the end of the performance Kim Jong Un congratulated the performers on their successful performance, waving to enthusiastically cheering performers and audience.
					
					 He appreciated the creators and artistes of the ensemble for greatly contributing to celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK with splendor by devoting their creative wisdom and enthusiasm to make good preparations of the performance in a short span of time.
					
					 He gave his thanks to them.
					
					 Among the audience were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam and Choe Pu Il, members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, chief secretaries of the Provincial Party Committees, members of the central guidance organ of the Party in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, ministers of the Cabinet, service personnel of the KPA and the KPISF, scientists and technicians in the field of scientific research, teachers and researchers of universities in the city, overseas Koreans, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their wives and other foreign guests.

articles.title: Parade, Mass Demo Mark DPRK's 65th Birthday
articles.content:
Parade, Mass Demo Mark DPRK's 65th Birthday 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A parade of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and Pyongyang mass demonstration took place with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square on Monday, 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), appeared in the tribune of honor. 
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces organs and the Cabinet and chief secretaries of Provincial Party Committees of the WPK.
					
					 Kwon Sun Hwi, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, and Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, were also in the tribune of honor.
					
					 Seen at the reviewing stands were deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, merited people, delegations of overseas Koreans and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign delegations and delegates, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and their wives and military attaches here and other foreign guests.
					
					 The flags of the DPRK and the WPK were hoisted at the square amid playing of the music of national anthem and "Long Live Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					 The minister of the People's Armed Forces reported to Kim Jong Un that the parade will be started. 
					
					 A 21-gun salute boomed amid playing of the music of the immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il". 
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a speech. 
					
					 The speaker said that the history of the DPRK clearly proves immutable truth that the great leaders assure the high dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 He stressed that the army and people of the DPRK holding the peerlessly great men in high esteem generation after generation will as ever dynamically advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism and it will shine forever as the socialist state of Juche with the invincible might.
					
					 Flags bearing portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il entered the square, escorted by the flags of the Workers' Party of Korea and the colors of the Supreme Commander and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards. 
					
					 First, the column of Pyongyang City unit of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards marched past in fine array, being followed by columns of all provincial units, units of different factories and industrial establishments, cooperative farms, units of officials of land management and public health, universities at different levels and the column of the Young Red Guards. 
					
					 Then the columns of multiple launch rocket systems passed. 
					
					 They were followed by the mass demonstration of Pyongyangites.
					
					 Columns of dancers depicting the national flag, Taekwon-do players, military families, artistes, scientists, sportspersons, teachers and medical workers walked past the square.
					
					 Letters reading "Kim Il Sung", "Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Un", "Glory", "Celebration of 65th Anniversary", "Great Paektusan Nation", "Speed on Masik Pass", "Economic Power", "Single-minded Unity", etc. were presented on the square and the flags of the DPRK and the WPK were portrayed in succession.
					
					 The combined military band changed its formation, presenting the star of the Marshal and portraying letters reading "Defense", to successfully decorate the end of the demonstration.
					
					 After the demonstration, there were loud hurrahs resounding far and wide, fireworks being shot up and balloons rising to the sky.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stepped to the balcony of the platform and warmly acknowledged the enthusiastically cheering crowds.

articles.title: Participants in Parade Welcomed by Pyongyang Citizens
articles.content:
Participants in Parade Welcomed by Pyongyang Citizens
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The participants in the military parade for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK received warm welcome by Pyongyang citizens in streets of Pyongyang on Monday.
					 A long procession of trucks carrying paraders left the plaza of the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Officials of ministries and national institutions, workers and schoolchildren warmly welcomed the paraders in front of Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 As the train of trucks passed Chollima Street, Hero Street, Pipha Street and University Street, a lot of Pyongyangites warmly waved to the paraders in the streets extending scores of kilometers.
					
					 Members of art groups of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the Mansudae Art Studio gave performances and schoolchildren's bands played music, adding to the mood. 
					
					 War veterans waved their hands to the paraders. 
					
					 There were children waving their hands from windows of their houses.
					
					 Even foreigners and overseas Koreans extended congratulations to the paraders. 
					
					 The columns of multiple launch rocket systems passed through Sungri Street and Changjon Rotary amid welcome by people from all walks of life.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Celebrate DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Celebrate DPRK's Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A banquet took place at Okryu Restaurant Monday, the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and people of merit. 
					
					 Attending it were heads of the overseas Koreans' delegations and overseas compatriots and the chief of Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Also present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations, military attaches and their spouses and other foreign guests here. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech. 
					
					 He said the foundation of the DPRK was a historic event which opened up the new era of building socialist nation centered on the popular masses, an event which provided the Korean people with a genuine motherland for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years. 
					
					 The 65-year-long history of the DPRK shines as the glorious revolutionary history of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who turned the country into an independent and invincible power which displays its dignity all over the world, he said, adding:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will uphold the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and glorify the country as the country of the eternal sun and state of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and build in this land the most powerful country, people's paradise looked up by the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Russian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Monday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency respected Kim Jong Un,
					
					 Please accept my sincerest congratulations to you on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 I note with satisfaction that the relations between Russia and the DPRK are of friendly nature.
					
					 I am sure that our two countries will positively develop the bilateral relations in various fields in the future, too, and thus make a contribution to the wellbeing of the peoples of the two countries and the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 I wish you good health and success and all people of your country happiness and wellbeing.
					
					 Please accept my regard.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Monday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The message said that President Kim Il Sung proclaimed the founding of the DPRK before the whole world on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) on the basis of his original and rich experience and tradition of building a unique people's power.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK by Kim Il Sung made it possible for Korea, once eclipsed in the world map, to proudly emerge a dignified and independent sovereign state in the arena of history and provided all compatriots with powerful weapon for putting strong spurs to the complete reunification of the country and the prosperity of the nation, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung wisely led the confrontation with the U.S., the social revolution at two stages and the socialist construction of various phases, thus building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defense on the land of the north.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, regarding it as his noble mission to steadfastly uphold the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung, translated the plan of Kim Il Sung to build a rich and powerful country into reality and led the DPRK only along the road of victory and glory.
					
					 The exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the nation-building will shine forever with the prospering great Paektusan nation and the DPRK is shedding its brilliant rays as a genuine motherland of all compatriots thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great man of Mt. Paektu type. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the AINDF in the message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health, reflecting the unanimous reverence of the vanguard fighters and people from all walks of life in south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Monday received a congratulatory message from the General Association of Koreans in China on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					  The DPRK's founding was a historic declaration which heralded the appearance of the country guided by the idea of believing in people as in Heaven and the genuine state for the people, the first of its kind in human history, and an event of national historic significance as it brought a worthy life as an independent human being to the Koreans in the homeland and overseas, the message said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung who dedicated his all to the country and its people, finding himself among the people all his life, the DPRK could dynamically advance along the road of victory, meeting all challenges of history, and shed its rays all over the whole world as a bulwark of independence indicating the future of humankind.
					
					 The DPRK adorned with victories and glory shed more brilliant rays and demonstrated its might as a dignified socialist power of Juche steering the 21st century and the motherland of Songun boasting its tremendous national power thanks to general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un, possessed of matchless outstanding quality and traits,  has brought to the highest level the dignity of the socialist motherland associated with the feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il all their lives, decisively meeting all challenges of the imperialists with  his tested leadership. 
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all compatriots here wish Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people and tender-hearted father of the overseas compatriots, good health for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the prosperity of the DPRK, the independent reunification of the country and the development of the movement of Koreans in China.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on Monday.
					 The message said:
					
					 We have the honor to extend you and, through you, to the government and friendly people of the DPRK the sincerest congratulations and best wishes on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on my own behalf on the occasion of the anniversary of your country and hope that the day of achieving progress, prosperity and safety desired by your people and government will come as soon as possible.
					
					 We, availing ourselves of this important opportunity, would like to express thanks to you for sending full support and solidarity to the Palestinian people, being concerned about our just cause and standing by our side in the legitimate struggle to end the occupation and establish a sovereign state with East Kuds as capital.
					
					 We sincerely wish you good health and happiness, hoping that the resilient historical and friendly relations between the peoples of our two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Bangladeshi President 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from M.D. Abdul Hamid, president of Bangladesh, on Monday. 
					 In the message the Bangladeshi president, on behalf of the Bangladeshi people and on his own behalf, extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the people of the DPRK on the 65th anniversary of the country. 
					
					 Noting that the deep-rooted and excellent bilateral relations between Bangladesh and the DPRK have developed on the principle of peaceful co-existence, trust, equality and reciprocity, he expressed the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger. 
					
					 He extended best regards to Kim Jong Un, sincerely wishing him happiness in good health and the friendly people of the DPRK durable peace and sustained advance and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Cuban Leader on DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Cuban Leader on DPRK Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on Monday.
					 Raul Castro Ruz in the message sent warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and expressed his will to further develop the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two fraternal countries.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un well-being and greater success in his work and the DPRK peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Monday on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The message said that the DPRK which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by general secretary Kim Jong Il is a genuine country for the people, the first of its kind in human history, and a socialist power of Juche standing imposingly despite the stern test of history under the leadership of the great leaders and party.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the cause of Juche, has led the DPRK to usher in a great heyday of epoch-making leap forward and prosperity, upholding independence, Songun and socialism as a strategy for the century.
					
					 We will dynamically conduct in a unique manner national education and work with the younger generation and Korean commercial workers, go deeper among compatriots and unite compatriots from all walks of life close around the DPRK and Chongryon organizations.
					
					 We will firmly defend the socialist homeland, make a tangible contribution to the building of an economic power, breathing the same breath and keeping pace with the compatriots in the homeland making a general advance for a final victory, and intensify the movement for national reunification and external activities as required by the prevailing situation.
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee sincerely wishes Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the cause of Juche and the tender-hearted father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, good health, reflecting the ardent loyalty of all Chongyron officials and Koreans in Japan, concluded the message.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 They are the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan a
					
					 nd other central organizations of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations, Choson Sinbo Company that is the mouthpiece of Chongryon, Korean  News Service, Hagu Bookshop, Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, Tonghae Company Ltd., Korean Goods Sales Company, Kumgang Insurance Company, Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, Korean Press Hall in Tokyo and other business bodies, prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, Korea University and Korean schools at all levels in Japan. 
					
					 The messages and letters wish Kim Jong Un good health for prosperity of the motherland and development of the movement of the Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Greetings to Tajik President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tajik President 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Emomali Rahmon, president of Tajikistan, on Monday on its national day. 
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger day by day, he wished the president and people of Tajikistan success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Mark DPRK's 65th Birthday
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Mark DPRK's 65th Birthday 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Monday editorially mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun in an editorial said the DPRK is a socialist state of Juche achieving prosperity generation after generation upholding the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 It is great honor and pride of the DPRK that it has displayed its dignity as an invincible socialist power while invariably glorifying its name, national emblem and flag for 65 years since their first institution despite all sorts of ordeals in the turbulent 20th century and the ever-changing 21st century, the editorial noted, and went on: 
					
					 The great leader Kim Il Sung is the founder of the DPRK and its eternal President. 
					
					 He created the genuine guiding idea of building the socialist state and gave perfect answers to all the theoretical and practical problems and developed the revolutionary government into the one representative of the independent rights of the popular masses and organizer of creativity and activities which looks after the people's living and protects their interests with responsibility. 
					
					 His noble patriotic cause was successfully carried forward and steadily advanced by general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the precious wealth in this land is a result of patriotic devotions made by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. The history of the DPRK is proud and glorious thanks to the Generalissimos and their undying nation-building exploits. 
					
					 The history of the prosperity of the DPRK is the sacred one of victorious advance based on the transparent faith of the Generalissimos in independence and an immortal heroic epic in which it has worked miracles in the history of the anti-imperialist struggle along the road of Songun opened up by them. It is also the history of valuing and loving the people in which the idea of the Generalissimos believing in the people as in Heaven has been fully embodied.
					
					 In another century of Juche era the DPRK has greeted the bright era of prosperity under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should cherish the pride and honor of living in the great socialist country and more vigorously push forward the general advance for a final victory in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Laid before the statues of the great Generalissimos was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who founded the immortal Juche idea and turned the DPRK into an invincible political and ideological power and world-level military power.
					
					 At the halls where the great Generalissimos lie in state, the visitors made bows. 
					
					 They went round the hall where the orders the great Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their life.

articles.title: Kumsusan Palace of Sun Crowded with Visitors
articles.content:
Kumsusan Palace of Sun Crowded with Visitors
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Crowds of people including servicepersons and schoolchildren Monday went to the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					 They paid tribute to the portraits of Generalissimos at the plaza park of the palace.
					
					 Going round the lawn, flower garden, fountains and resting places in the park they recollected the painstaking efforts with which Marshal Kim Jong Un wisely led the construction of the plaza park, being considerate of the people's minds to the plaza into the most beautiful place.
					
					 The visitors enjoyed the scenic beauty of the park having photos taken.

articles.title: People, Servicepersons Paid Tribute to Martyrs on DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
People, Servicepersons Paid Tribute to Martyrs on DPRK Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statues of martyrs, the memorial towers and the cemeteries for the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army across the country with due ceremonies on Monday, the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present at the ceremonies were officials of the local party, power organs and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and Korean People's Internal Security Forces, workers, youth and schoolchildren.
					
					 They offered wreaths in the name of their organizations and institutions and bunches of flowers.
					
					 They paid tribute to the martyrs for their devotion to the prosperity of the country and the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
 Moscow, September 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on September 6 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Among those present there on invitation were Russian Vice Foreign Minister Igor Morgulov, deputies to the State Duma including the head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma and others.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants firstly laid a floral basket and bouquets before a full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute.
					
					 They looked round works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and photos showing the path covered by the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae in his speech said Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK 65 years ago and turned it into a socialist power -- independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defense -- and Kim Jong Il developed the country into a political, ideological and military power, upholding the banner of Songun.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It is an invariable stand of the Workers' Party and the DPR of Korea to value the tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship and continue to boost it as required by the new century.
					
					 The DPRK will make all efforts to expand and develop the bilateral relations onto a higher stage under the agreement reached at the top level and in the spirit of the DPRK-Russia joint declarations to meet the aspiration and desires of the peoples of the two countries this year significantly marking the 65th anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Russia diplomatic ties.
					
					 Igor Morgulov said that September 9 is a significant day in the history of the Korean people when they took back the state power from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 He noted that the development of Russia-DPRK friendship which overcame the trials of the history and many-sided cooperation between the two countries absolutely favored the fundamental interests of the peoples of the two countries, expressing the will to actively cooperate with the DPRK in various fields.
					
					 He wished supreme leader Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people great successes in their drive for achieving socio-economic development and the promotion of people's well-being under his leadership.

articles.title: DPRK Hosts Reception for Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
DPRK Hosts Reception for Juche Idea Followers
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government gave a reception for the Juche idea followers at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Monday, the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Invited to the reception were foreign delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea on a visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is also chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, Ri Kil Song, vice-chairman of the Society, Ji Sung Chol, vice-president of the Academy of Social Sciences, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Winner of 11th Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum Contest
articles.content:
Winner of 11th Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum Contest
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The 11th Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum (Korean wrestling) Contest took place on Rungna Islet here from September 3 to 6.
					 The contest drew more than 130 players from the capital city of Pyongyang and provinces of the country.
					
					 Son Kwang Chol, a 23-year-old worker from South Hwanghae Province, took the first place in the catch-weight event of the contest, becoming the owner of the grand bull prize. In Juche 101 (2012) he made his debut at the annual contest to rank among the eight strongmen.
					
					 After winning a 1,000 kg bull and a golden cowbell, Son told KCNA: This honor goes to all the people of the country, and I have nothing to desire if it brings delight to my provincial inhabitants.

articles.title: Circus Show Marks Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
Circus Show Marks Anniversary of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A circus show was given by the National Circus at Pyongyang Circus Theater on Monday to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam and officials of armed forces organs and teachers and researchers of universities here.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and visiting groups of overseas compatriots and other Koreans and foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers like physical acrobatics "rope-skipping" and "balancing stunts with balls", comic acrobatics "playing with toys" and "skill with dishes".
					
					 Performers well represented the Korean people's revolutionary spirit and their optimistic living through skillful movements and elegant rhythms.
					
					 The performance gave delights and joy to the audience.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, workers, youth and schoolchildren visited the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute on the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of KPA and Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools at all levels in Pyongyang City.
					
					 The Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front offered a floral basket before the statues.
					
					 Placed before the statues of Generalissimos at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang were floral baskets in the name of units of the People's Army, institutions and industrial establishments. 
					
					 Servicepersons, workers, youth and schoolchildren across the country visited the statues of Generalissimos in their residential areas to pay tribute.

articles.title: Young Koreans Celebrate DPRK's 65th Anniversary
articles.content:
Young Koreans Celebrate DPRK's 65th Anniversary 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding on Monday in celebration of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Put on the stage were colorful pieces including female trio and pangchang "Fly Our Tri-color National Flag of the Republic" and song and dance "Do Not Ask My Name".
					
					 The performers highly praised the nation-building exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Through drama witticism "Name of Era", agitation and male solo "Motherland and I" and other pieces the performers vividly depicted the spiritual world of young people in the Songun era devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm in all the construction sites of building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Mixed chorus "Motherland and Youth Will All Be Glorified", mixed duet "I Will Devote My Youth to Motherland" and other pieces fully showed the spirit of young people preparing themselves to be successors to the revolutionary cause of Songun. 
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Dancing parties of youth and students took place in Pyongyang and other parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK RC Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK RC Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Executive Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Paek Yong Ho returned home on Monday. It took part in the seminar of the Asia-Pacific region on the development and humanitarian activities held in China.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Arrive 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Members of the International Weightlifting Federation and the Asian Weightlifting Federation arrived here on Monday to take part in 2013 Asian cup and club weightlifting championship for youth and adult categories.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Always Finds Himself among Popular Masses
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Always Finds Himself among Popular Masses 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly great man who pioneered the way of building a socialist state centered on popular masses for the first time in history.
					 Regarding the popular masses as masters of politics, he set forth all lines and policies in reflection of their desire and requirements.
					
					 His politics centered on the popular masses was fully represented in the Agrarian Reform Law, the policy of agricultural cooperativization, the policy of giving priority to the development of heavy industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture and the line of simultaneously pushing ahead with the economic construction and defence building.
					
					 Kim Il Sung pressed ahead with socialist construction in reliance upon the people, sharing the sweets and bitters with them.
					
					 In the postwar days when the country was in hard time, he went to the Kangson Steel Plant to call upon its workers to boost production, saying that he believed them and they believed him and appealing to them to tide over the difficulties.
					
					 There were days when he sat knee to knee with peasants to discuss farming and when he personally selected a site for building a reservoir with a torch in his hand. 
					
					 He had made ceaseless field guidance to all parts of the country in disregard of weather conditions and holidays.
					
					 That is why the DPRK people are sorely missing Kim Il Sung, who devoted his all to the wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: Delegation of State Archives Administration of China Here
articles.content:
Delegation of State Archives Administration of China Here
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of State Archives Administration of China headed by Deputy Director-General Li Heping arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Servile S. Korean Media Slammed
articles.content:
Servile S. Korean Media Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People carried an article contributed by Doctor of media sociology Ko Sung U on Friday.
					 The article noted that south Korean media have intensified the propaganda campaign in conspiracy with the dictatorial regime, shunning things unfavorable for the authorities and deluging the public with the information favorable for them.
					
					 Accusing newspapers Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo of taking the lead in the campaign, the article disclosed that the basic goal of the campaign is to lure the public to take the direction wanted by the politicians in power.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the media do not report about the actions denouncing the Intelligence Service's interference in the election but release the spate of reports about the groundless case of plotted rebellion targeting an opposition party, the article said.
					
					 This clearly proves that the media are acting as a stooge of the IS, the servant of Chongwadae, the article deplored.
					
					 It warned that as long as the power and the media are conspiring with each other, it is impossible to see the democratic development of society.

articles.title: Actions against IS's Plot Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against IS's Plot Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released an appeal on Wednesday calling for actions to foil the puppet regime's moves of cooking up the case of plotted rebellion and disorganize the Intelligence Service.
					 The appeal noted that due to the IS's moves to fabricate the case of plotted rebellion the ghost of "Yusin" dictatorship is being revived and the conservative forces are hell-bent on obliterating the progressive ones.
					
					 It termed the case of plotted rebellion a typical charade aimed to cope with the candlelight actions and a stereotyped politically-motivated scenario fabricated by the dictatorial forces to turn society into the one dominated by IS.
					
					 If the efforts to foil the plot end in failure, the suppression of the Unified Progressive Party will lead to the wholesale repression of the candlelight actions and the second "Yusin" era plagued by illegality and injustice, the appeal warned.
					
					 It stressed the need to pool the strength of all the people and intensify the candlelight actions in order to resolutely smash the IS's plot and disorganize it.
					
					 It called on all the progressive forces and people from all walks of life to firmly unite to usher in the era of people's sovereignty and peaceful reunification by foiling the IS's plot, disorganizing the IS and checking the revival of the "Yusin" dictatorship and terror-ridden policy.

articles.title: Intelligence Service Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Intelligence Service Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Chairpersons of regional committees of the Unified Progressive Party, an opposition party of south Korea, held an emergency press conference in front of the "National Assembly" building on Sept. 2 in protest against the Intelligence Service's moves to cook up the case of plotted rebellion.
					 At the conference they charged that the IS's moves are a revelation of the authorities' attempt to calm down the people angered by the IS's interference in the election, split the democratic forces, revive the "Yusin" dictatorial rule and thus escape from the ruling crisis.
					
					 They declared that the progressive and democratic forces will pool their strength and stage actions until they find out the truth behind the IS's interference in the election and its masterminds and frustrate the moves to fabricate the case of plotted rebellion.
					
					 They called on all the democratic forces to unite and stage actions to achieve the common goal for dismantling the IS and defending the democracy.
					
					 A letter of protest to the present chief executive was read out at the conference.
					
					 The letter urged the present chief executive to approve the special investigation for probing the truth behind the IS's interference in the election and punishing those involved and discontinue the suppression of a lawmaker from the opposition party.

articles.title: Reception Given in Honor of Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Reception Given in Honor of Overseas Koreans 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A reception was given in honor of overseas Koreans on Monday, the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Present there on invitation were the delegation of officials of the Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, delegation of officials of Korean Commercial Associations in Japan and other overseas Koreans' delegations and Korean compatriots staying here.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Mark DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Mark DPRK Anniversary 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on September 7 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Vice-Chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee Nam Sung U read out a congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to all the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan on the occasion.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his report that he was very much honored and felt happy to receive the congratulatory message of Kim Jong Un reflecting the minds of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The long period since the date of the Republic's foundation marked the history of gigantic struggle and changes through which the great Generalissimos set a world-wide model for building a socialist state by devoting all their wisdom and efforts, and also a proud history in which they successfully realized a long-cherished ideal and desire of the popular masses.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the benevolent father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan leading the cause of Juche and the movement of Koreans in Japan straight to a victory.
					
					 We will hold the great Generalissimos in high esteem as the eternal sun with determination to repay Kim Jong Un's great trust and loving care and develop Chongryon which was hewed out and demonstrated its victory under the care of the great men of Mt. Paektu into a model organization of the overseas compatriots movement in the world.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un from the Chongryon Central Standing Committee was read out at the meeting.
					
					 On the same day, a photo exhibition of Chongryon and evening gala celebrating the anniversary were held at the Korean Hall of Culture and outside the hall.

articles.title: DPRK Birthday Marked across Country
articles.content:
DPRK Birthday Marked across Country
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- People including youth and students across the country held colorful events to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Broad spectrum of people visited statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in various areas including Pyongyang and provincial seats to pay tribute.
					
					 Wreaths and bunches of flowers were laid before the statues of martyrs, the memorial towers and cemeteries of fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army across the country by officials of the party, power organs and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the KPA and Korean People's Internal Security Forces, workers, youth and schoolchildren.
					
					 People of all social strata including youth and students visited the photo exhibitions showing photos about exploits of peerlessly great men held in Jagang Province, North Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and other places.
					
					 A concert "Do Prosperous, My Motherland" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at Moranbong Theater and a circus show at Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Celebration performances were given by officials, working people, artistes, members of the women's union, youth and students in North Hwanghae Province, South Hamgyong Province, Kanggye City, Wonsan City, Sinuiju City, Kaesong City, the construction site of Masik Pass Ski Resort, the Sepho tableland reclamation site and the construction  site of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station.
					
					 A sports contest was held by more than 10 000 people in Hamhung City at Hamhung Stadium, adding to the festive mood.
					
					 Colorful celebration meetings, oratorical meetings and sports games took place in North Hamgyong Province, Ryanggang Province and others.
					
					 Youth and students across the country held dancing parties amid elated atmosphere.
					
					 Cheerful laughs of people could be heard in parks and recreation grounds.
					
					 After the sunset, electric lights brightly decorated the nocturnal sky of the country in September.

articles.title: Many Popular Policies Enforced in DPRK for 65 Yrs
articles.content:
Many Popular Policies Enforced in DPRK for 65 Yrs
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has ceaselessly enforced popular policies in all realms of social life for the past over six decades to improve the people's well-being and provide them with highly civilized material and cultural living conditions.
					 After the liberation of the country, many state policies and laws for the interests of the working masses were adopted. They included the "Labor Law for the Workers and Office Employees in North Korea" and the law on the enforcement of universal compulsory primary education system.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War, too, new policies were put into force for fighters of the People's Army and people.
					
					 The state measure was taken to rehabilitate the destroyed sanatoria and rest homes for the working people and rest homes appeared on front-line areas for service personnel.
					
					 The universal free medical care system was introduced in the country in January Juche 42 (1953).
					
					 After the war several Cabinet decisions were made to provide medical aid to workers, technicians and office employees and to intensify public health service for them.
					
					 The universal compulsory primary education system was enforced from August 1956 and the universal compulsory secondary education system from November 1958 by the policy of the DPRK, which has given a top priority to the education of the rising generations.
					
					 The universal compulsory eleven-year education was introduced all over the country in September 1, 1975 and "Theses on Socialist Education" was published on September 5, 1977.
					
					 Children have been brought up at kindergartens and nurseries at the state expense after the adoption of the "Law of the DPRK on the Nursing and Upbringing of Children".
					
					 The historic measure to remove all the agricultural tax in kind was taken in the period between 1964 and 1966 by the state policy of regarding it as the supreme principle to steadily improve the promotion of people's well-being.
					
					 The DPRK became a country where no one is rated for anything for the first in the world by the enactment of the law "On Abolishing the Tax System" released by the Supreme People's Assembly in March 1974.
					
					 The state social insurance and social security service are vivid examples of the policies by which the state takes care of the people's living with responsibility.
					
					 Sanatoria and rest homes were built on famous mountains including Mts. Myohyang and Kuwol and in scenic spots, hot spring and mineral spring resorts and on sand beaches in the eastern and western coastal areas which draw more than 300 000 people from all walks of life every year.
					
					 Many state policies including the premium system for honored disabled soldiers have been introduced on a higher level.
					
					 The proclamation of the law on enforcing the universal compulsory twelve-year education is a result of the consistent policy of our party and state to glorify the idea on Juche-oriented education and immortal exploits performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was published in pamphlet by a publishing house of Peru on August 30.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il performed all their lives.
					
					 It indicates tasks to be fulfilled to firmly defend and preserve the ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and eternally glorify them and covers other issues.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute released a joint statement on September 3 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The exploits performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in nation-building by successfully leading the country will be immortal along with the century.
					
					 The DPRK's 65-year history is a glorious one in which the great Generalissimos strengthened and developed the DPRK into a fortress of socialism and bulwark of independence against the imperialists, guided by the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 Over the last 65 years the DPRK and its people have firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and socialist principle under the banner of Juche while frustrating the obstructive moves by all enemies of all stripes.
					
					 All the victories won by the DPRK in the Fatherland Liberation War in the 1950s and in the struggle for defending socialism in the 1990s and the 21st century are a brilliant fruition brought about by the original ideas, politics and leadership of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 The DPRK and its people will continue to dynamically advance along the way of Juche and Songun, meeting the challenges of the enemies under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader, true to the behests of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 Peru and the world progressive people extend invariable support and solidarity to the fraternal DPRK and its people in their just struggle to build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification.

articles.title: Democratic Congolese Organization Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Democratic Congolese Organization Praises DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo issued a bulletin on September 3 to mark the anniversary of the DPRK, September 9
					 The bulletin under the headline "The Korean people grandiosely celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK" carried articles titled "Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK", "65th anniversary of victory and glory" and "Epoch-making miracles and changes achieved by the DPRK".
					
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The DPRK, which proclaimed its birth on September 9, 1948, has covered the path of victory and glory over the past 65 years.
					
					 The country has consistently aspired after the building of a unique socialist state centered on the popular masses.
					
					 It set forth the promotion of people's well-being as the supreme principle of the state in its activities, thoroughly embodied the slogan "We Serve the People!" and enforced all kinds of popular policies such as the universal free medical care and free education systems, abolition of taxes and free supply of dwelling houses by the state.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un enjoying absolute support and trust by the people has devoted his all to increasing the defense capabilities and improving the people's standard of living, by carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The future of the DPRK is immensely bright as it is led by another great man.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Praise DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Praise DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 65th Anniversary of the DPRK, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on September 2.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung proclaimed the foundation of the DPRK on September 9, 1948.
					
					 The young DPRK faced grave difficulties in 1950. It had to frustrate the heinous aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK won a historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The victory of the Korean people in the war was a historic event in defending the freedom and independence of the country and guaranteeing the bright future of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 From the first day of its foundation the DPRK government has made positive efforts to reunify the country and in this course it has achieved many successes.
					
					 The DPRK has reliably defended not only the sovereignty of the country but also the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The behests of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on building a thriving nation and achieving the cause of national reunification will surely come true under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted on the website of the Romanian Socialist Union on August 30.
					 The talk was carried by Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, the Day of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre nueva avenida de cientificos de Unha
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre nueva avenida de cientificos de Unha
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la avenida de cientificos de Unha recien construida.
					 Dando vueltas por varias viviendas de los apartamentos no.3 y 15, expreso satisfaccion por la obra perfecta y las muebles de buena calidad colocadas en la cocina, albergue y sala de estudio.
					
					 Diciendo que podemos realizar otro deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes prestaron atencion a ofrecer a los cientificos las condiciones de vida mas excelentes, senalo que los Generalisimos estarian muy alegres si vieran esta avenida y agrego que subrayo que he aqui la razon de hacer la revolucion. 
					
					 Enseno que el pais prosperara solo cuando hace la revolucion con la correcta posicion sobre la ciencia y el personal calificado, y anadio que en el futuro el partido tomara por direccion del golpe principal en el sector de construccion la edificacion de las viviendas y casas de reposo para los funcionarios del sector cientifico y educativo.
					
					 Hizo recorrido por la casa-cuna de Unha.
					
					 Viendo uno tras otro la piscina, el comedor y la cocina, dijo que los padres, quienes dejaron en la casa-cuna a sus hijos, podran trabajar bien sin ninguna preocupacion.
					
					 Pasando por el grupo de educacion no.3, el dormitorio, la sala de juegos de inteligencia, la sala de juegos generales y las piscinas bajo techo y al aire libre, destaco con amplia sonrisa que se haya construido bien la casa-cuna conforme a la psicologia de los ninos y apunto que les gustarian mucho.
					
					 Recorrio el jardin infantil no.1 de Unha.
					
					 Al ver la chapa de goma flexible del patio deportivo se mostro alegre de que los ninos podran jugar a sus anchas y no se heriran si caen.
					
					 Al pasar la piscina, grupos del alto grado no. 2 y 5, el de bajo grado no.5, la sala de danzas, el dormitorio y comedores evaluo que se han construido interesante y minuciosamente todas las salas y fabricado bien las camas.
					
					 Recorriendo la escuela secundaria superior, la secundaria basica y la primaria de Unha construidas nuevamente, se mostro satisfecho de que se hayan ofrecido a los alumnos las maximas condiciones y ambiente de educacion.
					
					 La educacion para la futura generacion es la labor importante relacionada con la prosperidad o ruina del pais, senalo y enfatizo que los educadores deben ser raices para formar el futuro de la patria.
					
					 Paso por el centro de servicio publico de Unha, restaurantes y tiendas construidos en dicha avenida y parques construidos en varios lugares de la zona de viviendas.
					
					 Viendo los parques dotados del patinadero de ruedas y otros equipos de juegos, evaluo altamente que se han acondicionado bien como parques multifuncionales y multipropositos capaces de hacer simultaneamente el deporte y el descanso.
					
					 Dijo que los constructores crearon un milagro al construir una avenida durante 7 meses y les dio agradecimiento en nombre del CC del PTC.
					
					 Le acompanaron Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim In Sik, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song, Hong Yong Chil y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Tienen lugar desfile militar del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y manifestacion multitudinaria
articles.content:
Tienen lugar desfile militar del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y manifestacion multitudinaria 
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar con solemnidad este lunes en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el desfile militar del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y la manifestacion multitudinaria de capitalinos en celebracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 Salio a la tribuna el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Consejo de Ministros, los secretarios responsables del Comite del PTC en las provincias, Kwon Sun Hwi, asesor del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y Choe Un Bok, presidenta de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China.
					
					   En los asientos reservados para los invitados se veian los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e  informacion, hombres benemeritos, compatriotas en ultramar y sus delegaciones de visita en la patria socialista y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					   Fueron invitados las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises, los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					   Mientras se interpretaban el Himno Nacional y la cancion "Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea", se izaron la bandera de la RPDC y la del PTC.
					
					   El ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares informo al Mariscal el inicio del desfile militar del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino en celebracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC. 
					
					   Se tiraron 21 salvas artificiales con la interpretacion de los inmortales himnos revolucionarios "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y la "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il". 
					
					   Hizo uso de la palabra Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					   El orador senalo que la historia de la RPDC es la que ha probado claramente la firme verdad de que cuando se enaltece al gran lider y al gran  dirigente hay la dignidad y la prosperidad del pais y la nacion.
					
					   Subrayo que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que han enaltecido de generacion en generacion al gran hombre sin igual avanzaran firmemente en el futuro tambien por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo y la RPDC brillara eternamente como el Estado socialista del Juche dotado de un invencible poderio.
					
					   Pasaron por la plaza las banderas con las imagenes sonrientes de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, escoltadas por las banderas del PTC y del Comandante Supremo del EPC y los estandartes del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino. 
					
					   Marcharon a pasos firmes las columnas de los miembros del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino de la ciudad de Pyongyang, seguido de las otras provinciales, las de fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas, las de sectores de administracion territorial y de salud publica, las de universidades y las de la Guardia Juvenil Roja. 
					
					   A continuacion, avanzaron las columnas de los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados.
					
					   Seguidamente, se inicio la manifestacion multitudinaria de capitalinos.
					
					   Entre las filas de manifestantes figuraban las con bandera nacional, las de taekwondocas, las de familiares de militares, las de artistas, cientificos, deportistas, maestros y funcionarios de salud publica, etc.
					
					   En el suelo de la plaza se inscribian las letras "Kim Il Sung", "Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Un", "Gloria", "En celebracion del 65o aniversario", "Potencia del monte Paektu", "Velocidad Masikryong", "Potencia economica", "Unidad monolitica", "Defensa a riesgo de vida", etc. y las banderas de la RPDC y del PTC.
					
					   La banda militar general decoro el fin de la manifestacion multitudinaria inscribiendo con el cambio de su formacion la estrella de Mariscal y la letra "Defensa" 
					
					   Al termino de la manifestacion estremecieron el cielo y la tierra las aclamaciones de "!Vivas!", se tiraron las salvas festivas y volaron al cielo los globos de goma.
					
					 El Mariscal en el balcon de la tribuna respondio con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones de los habitantes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el presidente de la Federacion Rusa Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 La misiva senala:
					
					 Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un,
					
					 Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC, quisiera llegarle a Vd. las sinceras felicitaciones.
					
					 Me encuentro satisfecho de que tienen el caracter amistoso las relaciones Rusia-RPDC.
					
					 Estoy convencido de que en el futuro tambien nuestros dos paises desarrollaran activamente en varias ramas las relaciones bilaterales para contribuir al bienestar de los pueblos de ambos paises y al aseguramiento de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					 Deseo a Vd. buena salud y exitos y a todo el pueblo de vuestro pais la felicidad y el bienestar.
					
					 Reciba el testimonio de mi consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes chinos
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, y Pak Pong Ju, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, recibieron un mensaje de felicitacion que les enviaran juntos el dia 8 Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China, Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado, y Zhang Dejiang, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la RPCh.
					 El texto sigue:
					
					 En ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hacemos llegar nuestra calurosa felicitacion a ustedes, y por su conducto, al PTC, al gobierno y al pueblo de Corea en representacion del PCCh, el gobierno y pueblo de China.
					
					 Con la fundacion de la RPDC de hace 65 anos, el pueblo coreano entro en el verdadero camino para construir el Estado socialista y escribio nueva pagina de la historia de Corea.
					
					 Bajo la direccion del PTC el pueblo coreano logro importantes exitos en la causa de la construccion socialista.
					
					 Deseamos de todo corazon al pueblo coreano nuevos exitos mas grandes en el desarrollo economico y social del pais.
					
					 La amistad China-Corea, preparada y cultivada por los dirigentes de veterana generacion de los dos paises es la valiosa riqueza comun de los dos paises y sus pueblos.
					
					 Conforme al espiritu de "continuacion de tradiciones, aspiracion al futuro, buena vecindad, amistad y fortalecimiento de cooperacion", consolidaremos de continuo las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y contribuiremos activamente a la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo de la region dando el bienestar a los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					 Deseamos a la RPDC la prosperidad y a su pueblo la felicidad.

articles.title: Acto central por 65o aniversario de RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por 65o aniversario de RPDC
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, benemeritos laborales, trabajadores capitalinos, compatriotas y delegaciones y grupos de visita en la patria socialista y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					 Fueron invitados representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y agregados militares, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					 El informante destaco que la RPDC es el Estado socialista de tipo jucheano, que brilla por la original idea y las proezas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en materia de la construccion del Estado, y sirve de fuerte arma que garantiza la dignidad independiente del pueblo coreano y la prosperidad nacional. 
					
					 Despues de la liberacion de la patria, el Presidente asento la firme base de la construccion de un Estado independiente y soberano, y a base de ello, proclamo el 9 de septiembre del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche la  fundacion de la RPDC, recordo y continuo: 
					
					 La fundacion de la RPDC fue un gran acontecimiento historico que permitio al pueblo coreano tener por primera vez en la historia nacional de cinco milenios su verdadera patria y disfrutar de una vida libre y feliz como dueno del poder estatal. 
					
					 Bajo la probada y destacada guia del Presidente y del Dirigente, la RPDC se ha fortalecido como potencia socialista invicta enarbolando la bandera revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					 La RPDC es el verdadero pais del pueblo que encarna con brillantez el noble ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) de los grandes Generalisimos. 
					
					 Estos grandes hombres hicieron que el poder de la Republica tomara Iminwichon como ideal fundamental de la construccion del Estado y subordinaran todas sus lineas y politicas y actividades a defender las demandas e intereses de las masas populares y a asegurar al pueblo suficientes condiciones de vida material y cultural. 
					
					 Gracias a la probada orientacion de ellos, la RPDC ha materializado satisfactoriamente la politica de amor y confianza en el pueblo, de modo que todo el pais se convierta en una gran familia armoniosa y unida. 
					
					 La RPDC es el Estado socialista con fuerte caracter Juche y la nacionalidad. 
					
					 El Presidente y el Dirigente tomaron por el principio fundamental mantener el caracter Juche, la nacionalidad y la linea independiente en la construccion y actividades del Estado y condujeron sabiamente las labores para llevarlo a cabo. 
					
					 La RPDC es la potencia del monte Paektu que sale victoriosa y exalta su poderio con el Songun. 
					
					 El Presidente y el Dirigente, exploradores y lideres de la revolucion del Songun, prestaron la atencion primordial a los asuntos militares durante todo el periodo de su guia al pais y concentro la fuerza en consolidar el poderio militar en cada periodo y cada etapa de la revolucion. 
					
					 Bajo la guia de los grandes Generalisimos, la RPDC defendio honrosamente la libertad y la independencia de la patria, tras aniquilar a los imperialistas norteamericanos que pretendian derrocar en su cuna este pais del pueblo con menos de dos anos de fundacion en aquel entonces, y logro victoria tras victoria en la confrontacion con el imperialismo sin detonaciones y defendio con firmeza la soberania nacional y las conquistas de la revolucion. 
					
					 Gracias a la destacada idea y la energica orientacion de los grandes Generalisimos, se han preparado las guias programaticas como las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria y las fuertes fuerzas del movimiento por la reunificacion, se ha allanado la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio y se abrio la radiante perspectiva para la reintegracion territorial del pais. 
					
					 Hoy dia, la RPDC abre una nueva era dorada de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, siguiendo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Enaltecer a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il como eterno Lider de la revolucion, eterno Presidente de la RPDC y eterno Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional y lograr la historica causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la reunificacion de la patria, bajo la  orientacion del Mariscal, constituyen el noble deber del ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					 Todos los militares y civiles deben registrar un nuevo auge en la marcha general de hoy por la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo, poniendo de pleno manifiesto el indoblegable fuerza espiritual, y construir mucho mas creaciones de eterna duracion con el poderio de accion conjunta entre el ejercito y el pueblo para que repercuten las vivas del socialismo y las risas felices del pueblo en todo el pais.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete en celebracion del 9 de septiembre
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete en celebracion del 9 de septiembre
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio el dia 9 en el Restaurante Okryu el banquete en celebracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 Asistieron ahi Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y benemeritos.
					
					 Tambien estuvieron presentes los jefes de delegaciones de compatriotas en ultramar, compatriotas de visita en la patria socialista y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					 Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					 En la ocasion hizo uso de la palabra Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					 El orador dijo que la fundacion de la RPDC fue un acontecimiento historico que dio por primera vez en la historia nacional de cinco milenios al pueblo coreano la verdadera patria y abrio la nueva era de la construccion del Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares.
					
					 La trayectoria de 65 anos de la RPDC brilla como sagrada historia revolucionaria de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes convirtieron la patria en el pais independiente y la potencia invicta de talla mundial, puntualizo.
					
					 El ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC glorificaran la RPDC como eterno pais del Sol, o sea, Estado de Kim Il Sung y de Kim Jong Il, y levantaran sobre este territorio el paraiso del pueblo, la mejor potencia admirada por todo el mundo apoyando la guia del PTC, finalizo.
